uav.generic.hardware.sensors

Class Attitude

  • java.lang.Object
    • uav.generic.hardware.sensors.Attitude

  • public class Attitude
extends java.lang.Object
    The class models the attitude of the drone (pitch, yaw, roll).
    Since:
    version 2.0.0
